description: Monitoring Dashboard for Debezium MySQL connector.

panels.content:
# Debezium MySQL Connector Metrics

The Debezium MySQL connector has three metric types in addition to the built-in support for $job metrics that Zookeeper, Kafka, and Kafka Connect have.

* snapshot metrics (To view, select the date/time that the connector was started)

* binlog metrics

* schema history metrics

For more detailed informarion about the metrics please visit the Debezium documentation page

[Click here to visit](https://debezium.io/documentation/reference/1.0/assemblies/cdc-mysql-connector/as_deploy-the-mysql-connector.html#mysql-connector-binlog-metrics)
panels.title: General Info

panels.content:
# Schema Changes Metrics

For detailed explanation for all the schema changes metrics: [Visit Debezium documentation](https://debezium.io/documentation/reference/1.0/assemblies/cdc-mysql-connector/as_deploy-the-mysql-connector.html#mysql-connector-schema-history-metrics)
